website_summaries.verdict: Stylish ottoman adds flair to a room with fashion-forward fabric designs.
pros: Sturdy legs screw in for easy assembly
Hinged lid stays up and only closes when you push it down gently
It's a longer piece, for more of a bench look
Becomes the place of preference for all house cats
cons: Not much padding, so it’s not very cushy for people to sit on

customer_reviews.title: Pretty...but a visible seam on the lid
customer_reviews.text: It's prettier than I thought it would be. It was soo easy to put on the feet (took 5 min from unpacking till assembly). The base doesn't seem strong to keep books or anything heavy... but it is great for kid's toy, pillows, blanket. Also the fabric on the top lid is odd. I was expecting it to be seamless but there is a X like seam (see the pic) centered on the lid. The images don't align across the seams on the top. So if that bothers someone, it may not be a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: rm

customer_reviews.title: Love this ottoman
customer_reviews.text: Love this ottoman! Didn't realize how big it was going to be. It does stand taller than my couch but just by an inch. It's soft and sturdy. Even used it today to stand on. Bought it as a gift for kittys to lay on and they love it. Also love that it opens for storage. I will say my nail heads are silver and there is one small chunk missing but that's minute. Love this piece!
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Ottoman, but not very 'Cushy'
customer_reviews.text: Just got our Linon Stephanie script ottoman yesterday. Packaging was A+ and assembly—attaching the legs—was easy (hardware and Allen wrench included), and the illustrated directions were very clear. Each leg is attached in 3 places, with mounting brackets, making the ottoman very sturdy. Kudos also for the hinges and the vent holes on the bottom. We got a discounted price, which is always nice. Gray color matched the photo. The underlying material beneath the fabric is stiffer than I was expecting, but that may soften up over time. If you want a cushy ottoman, best not get this one. Otherwise, thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Young

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for a product at this price
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for a product at this price. The top of the ottoman is seamed diagonally, not 1 piece as pictured. Would have given it 5 stars if not for that. The legs are low enough, so you can stuff a few sandals under without people noticing. Do not expect to put heavy things inside the ottoman because the bottom is held up just by a piece of cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Sabi Sab

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable! Easy to assemble. Nice size and weight. The fabric is charcoal gray with white lettering. The beading around edge is silver. Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzydoxie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this ottoman! Color is perfect for a slate gray club chair I purchased from Amazon a few weeks ago. Love the length...plenty of room for my legs, serving tray and small dog. The inside storage holds 3 throws and a small pillow. So nice is the hinged lid and the way it stays open...no wrestling with the lid while hands are full. The legs are easy to install and each leg has 3 bolts...I think they will be and will remain sturdy and stable without becoming wobbly. I thought from the sellers photo the top was tufted but mine is not...small detail and I am still pleased. Highly recommend this ottoman.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca C.

customer_reviews.title: Love the product, but there was a rip
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It's exactly what I needed. Sturdy with enough storage and easy instructions for assembly, which is also fast. BUT... the inside lining on the top had a gash about six inches long. It's such a shame companies don't do a quality check. I could have returned it, but I needed it for a specific reason, so I said heck with it since it was inside. The company could have debated me a few bucks because they couldn't just send me a new lid. It was around the holidays so I chose just to keep it and take a loss. But the product itself, minus the rip, is great.
customer_reviews.author: M. D. Minuth

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: I got this ottoman today. Very well packaged and super easy to put together. Everything needed included. It’s very sturdy. I bought it basically to store blankets inside. I have included pictures. I have two full thick blankets and two smaller throws inside, and the lid closes with ease. Including pictures. The lid hinges are well made and the lid is easy up and down. The seams do not even show On top unless you look hard. I wish the material was heavier, but for the price this is a nice ottoman. Color to me is somewhere between taupe and gray. Wish it had been darker.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn M DeSha

customer_reviews.title: Returned it - color was off - storage lid did not aligh
customer_reviews.text: Returned this. 1) the color was off - not a dark enough grey to be truly a good grey. In fact, I thought it was a dark olive green in the box. 2) the lid did not meet up with the bottom half when closed. Wasn't off by a lot, just too much that I noticed it immediately!
customer_reviews.author: GeeJodee

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to get us through until we get new furniture. The gray goes well with the gray of my couch, not a perfect match but with the script on the ottoman no one notices. The storage is decent, holds 2 blankets. It does have a slight smell at first so I’d recommend letting it air out before storing anything. As for sturdiness this thing is a beast! My 88 lb dog loves it! He perches up there and can gaze out all the windows with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Hknepps

customer_reviews.title: Cute and spacious.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to go under a desk that I built myself off of Pinterest and it was just the thing I needed to complete the look. I wanted something that didn't cover the desk but would work for occasional seating while I worked at home sometimes. The only downside is that the cushioning on top is not very thick therefore it is starting to wear down in the center. I may have to get a different seating arrangement for the desk, but the bench is cute and pretty spacious inside. The color is like a charcoal gray with off white lettering.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my family
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t want to spend a ton of money, kids are rough, but I still wanted good quality and style. This is perfect. My daughter has jumped on it multiple times and it is showing no wear. It holds all of our extra couch blankets that we need for Midwest winters. We also love that’s it cushioned for our feet to be comfortable. Definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Just wish it were a tad longer but it still fits perfect! I wanted it to use a bench but ...
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute addition! Definitely was what I wanted! Just wish it were a tad longer but it still fits perfect! I wanted it to use a bench but also to store my purse, diaper bag, kids jackets, etc! Which is does great! And the bottom is pretty sturdy! Would definitely recommend this ottoman!:). And the design and color are great too!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Material wrong direction
customer_reviews.text: I just received this ottoman It seems very sturdy, nice-looking, good storage although not a lot. What I don't like is the fact that the material on the top is run the wrong direction so when you looking at the writing in the print it is upside down. The easy fix is to turn it around but then the hinges are on the wrong side and it opens up the wrong direction. To me this was very poor quality control it shouldn't have come through that way It will work but using storage will be inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, stylish, comfortable - great value!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty ottoman, easy to assemble, sturdy and useful! It comes assembled, except for the legs, which are simple to put on. It's very pretty and stylish, good quality, and our blankets fit nicely. Also, the cats like it and it's comfortable for your heels/feet. Win-win.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole C

customer_reviews.title: Great for what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design! It’s very sturdy and is currently holding all my art supplies so it definitely holds a lot. One thing to note is that there are four holes at the bottom which I’m guessing is for ventilation. I covered them with tape so nothing falls out, but if you’re going to hold blankets or the like it’s not going to be an issue. For the price I definitely recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Ryland

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and roomy. Perfect for storing shoes!
customer_reviews.text: This little ottoman is the perfect piece of furniture for my room! I am a college student so I live in a small apartment. This is perfect for storing my shoes at the end of my bed. Plus, it doubles as a really comfy seat! I also really like how it looks. The script is really pretty and the grey matches everything. This is a really good deal and if you are looking for shoe storage, I think it's perfect! Although, you could probably store many other things in it as well, like blankets. Really, it'd be perfect for whatever!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Too tall
customer_reviews.text: This is a well crafted piece. The only reason I disn't give it 5 stars is because it is taller than I expected. I am using it now with the legs on but I think I'm going to take them off in the future.
customer_reviews.author: jenesis

customer_reviews.title: Completely Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: You have to assemble the legs, but everything you need, including the small allen wrench, is in the box. The bench itself is pretty deep. I use it to store scrapbooks and photo albums. It holds around 8 of them. The quality of the fabric and the tacs around the bottom is average. It seems pretty durable so far. I've had it for a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Revae

customer_reviews.title: Great storage for shoes by door entrance
customer_reviews.text: I found this very useful to store and hide shoes by the door entrance and handy to sit on while putting on shoes. It is priced reasonably, the only reason I rated this. 4 star is because Of the stitching on the top cover. There is a pattern and the stitching did not match the pattern
customer_reviews.author: WWTRAV

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Fits in perfectly with our hodge-podge decor, and is a great footrest. Stores 2 home-made afhgans, including one that fits a king-sized bed. Very sturdy. My husband, who is 6'3" and around 275lbs, can sit on it and we don't worry about it breaking. I wouldn't suggest flopping down on it, but for sitting and putting on your socks and shoes it's just the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Adam/Heather

customer_reviews.title: I really like the design of the fabric and it was very ...
customer_reviews.text: The box arrived and was very light for me to carry up two flights up stairs. I really like the design of the fabric and the ottoman was very easy to assemble. The reason for 3 stars is because the Ottoman arrived with small dents on the bottom and there were two screws missing to completely secure the legs in. The missing screws were not a deal breaker for me because I mainly purchased this for extra storage and as a room accessory, but it would have been nice to have all the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: MadiGal

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful ottoman
customer_reviews.text: I researched Ottomans extensively on Amazon before choosing this one. It arrived packed perfectly, no shippping damage. Very easy to install the legs. It's beautiful, has ample storage and is very well made. The script on the fabric aligns and isn't lopsided. I've gotten numerous compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Debsco

customer_reviews.title: Great value, very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: It’s just as described. I’ve really enjoyed having the storage since I’m working from my bedroom these days. The storage is deep and just what I needed. It’s really pretty, too and adds to the aesthetics in my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Joan109

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Storage Ottoman
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish and easy to put together. I purchased this bench for my closet. I designed dividers out of foamboard so that I could store my socks and undergarments in the ottoman. It is deep enough to hold everything that I need, and it is keeping me organized. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Asbe25

customer_reviews.title: Quality and style
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful bench/ottoman!! I wanted something to set in front of my window at work and it looks great. Heavy and sturdy. Very elegant looking. Super easy to put the legs on. Was ready in a matter of minutes. I would highly recommend this for a living room, bedroom, den, or office. Any place in a room that needs an added touch of class.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Great value a must buy it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect I love it it’s such a great value I saw it in other places for way more money . Use it for my daughters toys in the living room . It’s a great neutral color and gray and it goes very well with my other furniture. Very chic
customer_reviews.author: Sandra tabar

customer_reviews.title: Storage and seating!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous storage bench! Holds approximately 6 large throws that would normally sit in the corner on the floor. Also use it at extra seating when we have family over for get togethers. Looks great in my farmhouse livingroom!
customer_reviews.author: Laura E Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, great functional piece
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value and sturdy enough to sit on and stand on. Sufficient storage for some sheet sets and pillow cases at the end of my bed. Easy to setup, only need screw on the included legs. This was the second of this brand I purchased. I use the other one in my office as an Ottoman/coffee table.
customer_reviews.author: CMcCarty

customer_reviews.title: Top of the bench is where all the stitch seams come together.... Looks terrible!
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was expecting. Quite small and has a cross pattern on the top where all the seams of stitching come together in the most obvious of places. Would love to return it but my husband threw away the box it came in.
customer_reviews.author: Maui Surfer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Ottoman
customer_reviews.text: I love this ottoman. I needed more space for the bed sheets and this worked perfect. It was easy to assemble and looks so nice in my bedroom. I am planning on getting a second one 😀 I highly recommend this ottoman.
customer_reviews.author: Leida Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken.
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty, but arrived with a broken internal frame on one side. Not a part that can be replaced. To return it, i have to pay for shipping, so... i guess it will always be broken? That sucks. The broken piece jeapordizes the integrity of the entire footstool. I was so excited, it just arrived a few minites ago. Very disappointed now.
customer_reviews.author: KFull

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this little chest. It's very well made and I love that the fabric is a tight weave - my large long-haired cat loves to lounge on this, and the cat hair sweeps off easily. He had an upset tummy last week and I had get out the shampooer. Happy to say because of the nature of the fabric, it still looks brand new, and the storage space is just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: This bench is nice design. Is pretty comfortable and really no assemble ...
customer_reviews.text: This bench is nice design. Is pretty comfortable and really no assemble require. The reason why I only gave 3 stars because the bench arrived with a huge ripped on the lining. And when my daughter and I both sat down on the bench I hear creeping noise. Not sure if the bench only hold 1 person. Both my daughter and I together weight about 210lbs. But I do like the look and don't want to deal with the return hassle. I'm keeping it but not sure how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: shoes lover

customer_reviews.title: Store your needs discreetly.
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I expected in terms of appearance and storage capacity. Size is as represented. I would like to see a bit me more perhaps memory foam cushioning on the lid. This very same item sells for over twice as much at another popular retailer, so this was a real Amazon bargain. I'm glad I cross checked.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Marie Estes

customer_reviews.title: Some assembly required.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for shoe storage. The top lifts open and stays open, great print, sturdy legs, plenty of room for shoes, and cushioned too. The legs came in a box placed inside the ottoman. This box did some damage to the inside by tearing the lining a bit.
customer_reviews.author: wstout

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. Top of chest does not line up on one end with bottom. Plenty of storage.several holes inside for air😕. Only had to put on legs, assembly easy.
customer_reviews.author: V. Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Great little bench
customer_reviews.text: Great little bench! I love that it is a bit higher than standard-level height. The top of it does have that odd "X" pattern as another reviewer pointed out with a photo, however, this doesn't bother me in the least and on the dark bench it doest seem off/noticeable at all. The lid does have tension rods so it doesn't slam shut which is fantastic. The interior is quite roomy and the top is firm yet soft - I use it under my desk for my feet for the entire day (so 8+ hours) and so far I am loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a bargain!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised to find that this inexpensive ottoman, which perfectly matches my decor, would be so well built. Happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely pattern and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and sturdy. I love sitting on it while I’m getting dressed. Beautiful colors. Loved the pattern. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: NICE FIT
customer_reviews.text: FITS GREAT WITH MY COUCH HAD A PROBLEM WITH IT WHEN IT ARRIVED AND THEY TOOK CARE OF IT RIGHT AWAY VERY HAPPY WITH MY CHOICE
customer_reviews.author: Sabia

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is just perfect ! I love it ! Fits a few pairs of shoes. And we love the design. Easy to put together and it's well made !
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Shaheen

customer_reviews.title: I liked that it was a basic ottoman with storage
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it was a basic ottoman with storage, BUT it wasn't tufted at ALL. On the top of the ottoman you can see where it was sewn so buttons could be placed for the tufts but it was not tufted at all. I may just put my sewing skills to work and 'create' my own tufts LOL
customer_reviews.author: Dionne Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and functional
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with this purchase. The fabric is very pretty in person. It's not too big, not too small. Fits perfectly under my window and doesn't block the outlet. And it's light and easy to move, so if I decide to put it somewhere else it won't be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: JoS

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this ottoman yesterday and I am in love with it. Beautiful and sturdy! Perfect addition to my space! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Will buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Got 2, about 3 or 4 years ago. Still in great condition. Recently bought one for an family member who uses it to not just store belongings but does his weight exercises on it. Definitely worth the purchase. Good quality and looks great in any room. This is on favorites list. Will be shopping again soon.
customer_reviews.author: Delicia Rudolph

customer_reviews.title: Linen Ottoman
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect ottoman for a smaller space. I put it in front of my sofa as a foot rest and it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: S Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Great ottoman. Purchased for my living room. My cat loves it. It fits perfectly under my bay window.
customer_reviews.author: Torrie Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Is not very tall but it’s perfect for sitting down while you’re putting on your shoes. The legs came in a box inside the storage area and tied so they were not lose, it also has a manual.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Flores

customer_reviews.title: Just like pictured in the description!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, it sits in my office by the window and stores guest sheets since the office also dubs as guest bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: toxicpokemom

customer_reviews.title: Not for DVD storage
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as depicted-only assembly required is to place legs-5 minutes.feels sturdy.nice charcoal gray that blends with my furniture.unfortunately not accommodating for DVD storage as hoped because of folding hinges that keep lid open.will use for blankets/throws.
customer_reviews.author: teresa godwin

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome ottoman! Easy to put together, very simple. Goes with any decor. Storage space to fit whatever you want to put in it, magazine, remotes, a couple blankets, whatever little items you want to hide in the living room or bedroom. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: It looks just like the photo, seems very sturdy and looks like it was more expensive. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: sausSTT

customer_reviews.title: I love it. The reason I am giving this product ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. The reason I am giving this product 4 stars is because some of the staples underneath the Ottoman were in the screw holes where the legs were to be attached. I had to find pliers to pull them out so the legs could be put on. The person who was stapling the fabric was not paying attention to what they were doing.
customer_reviews.author: Sandal

customer_reviews.title: Stylish ottoman with good capacity.
customer_reviews.text: Great ottoman, nice looking and stylish. Fits my daughter’s room perfectly well. Very easy to assemble, has a decent storage capacity, just enough to put a blanket and something else.
customer_reviews.author: Vera Sabin

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this item! My only regret is not getting the larger one.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: What I wanted, but came slightly damaged...
customer_reviews.text: Overall satisfied with the bench, but unfortunately a small portion of the interior came ripped. The outside of the bench is beautiful and exactly what I was looking for. The bench came with two small tears on the top portion of the inside, and because it’s not visible from the outside I’m not going to return it, but it is something to be wary about for future customers.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherC

customer_reviews.title: Not the color pictured
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the color. If this is grey, then it's such a dark grey it looks black. Plus I read a review and looked closely at the picture to make sure the nail heads were brass and they are definitely silver! Otherwise I like it but I cannot give it many stars because I did not get the color that I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly L. Backous

customer_reviews.title: It's the perfect size and so beautiful 😍😍
customer_reviews.text: Its so beautiful in person and its actually big enough for storage I really love it.
customer_reviews.author: Joylan11

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and amazing value!
customer_reviews.text: This ottoman is great. The storage compartment is more spacious than I thought, and is definitely sturdy. It is a bit uncomfortable to sit on as the cushion is not soft, but then again I don't use it as a chair in my living room. Would totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Luisa A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sturdy ottoman
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and Roomy enough for a comforter ! Seam on the top doesnt detract from the attractiveness! Love IT! The legs were easy to attach!
customer_reviews.author: A.Goree

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made and fit my small space beautifully! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: glenny's girl

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Bench
customer_reviews.text: Set up was a breeze. This bench is sturdy, not too big but large enough for a few kiddos to sit on (which is what I wanted it for!) Took a total of five minutes to put together and looks professional, sturdy and adds a unique look to our living room. Very happy with this bench!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonZing

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Furniture And Useful
customer_reviews.text: Love this piece and has a large space inside which I fit linens. 2blankets 2 pillows and mattress cover for a full futon as it turns to a bed. It’s quality and lovely
customer_reviews.author: Rheeanna

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous and Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Packaged very well. Took about 20 minutes to put together. Sturdy and holds two large blankets easily.
customer_reviews.author: One Wisemind

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our guest room. After reading some of the reviews I was a little skeptical about the top but it looks fine. It holds my decorative pillows and handy to sit down on to put your shoes on or whatever. Exactly what I wanted. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda D

customer_reviews.title: Cute but!
customer_reviews.text: The fabric was ripped inside and outside, looks like someone already used!. Return it.
customer_reviews.author: Mar tormo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful ottoman, but I'm missing one of the pieces ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful ottoman, but I'm missing one of the pieces to attach the leg ("Part C"; supposed to have 4 but I only received 3). I'll see what I can use in its place, but very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Hide and Seek addition
customer_reviews.text: This ottoman is stylish and adds nicely to my family room decor. It has a fun fabric covering and an abundance of storage. It is very sturdy and can hold a 7 year old during a game of hide and seek or act as an extra seat for an adult.
customer_reviews.author: Pappy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a bed bench
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the end of my bed. It matches my room perfectly. I put all my dogs toys in it and blankets.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Urato

customer_reviews.title: Not that sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Not that sturdy and I don't think I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua L.

customer_reviews.title: Ottoman came damaged but still cute
customer_reviews.text: My ottoman came damaged with a couple of holes inside of it, so I had to patch them up myself because it would’ve been a hassle to return it. It’s pretty sturdy but the storage capacity is quite small. It’s super cute, I do really like the design and the legs.
customer_reviews.author: Izzyaiah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bedroom
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that was a bit weird was the base of the trunk had some holes that I could not figure out the purpose. Otherwise it was perfect for my room.
customer_reviews.author: stacie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with small tear in front corner of top
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a small tear in the corner of top. Too late to return because we didn't unpack it until our kitchen remodel was complete. Love the color, fabric print and metal stud detail. Too bad it is too late to return it.:(
customer_reviews.author: Michelle K

customer_reviews.title: The ottoman is pretty nice, isn't overly large like some
customer_reviews.text: The ottoman is pretty nice, isn't overly large like some, but the storage makes it perfect for a small armchair or even a sofa chair. It's also pretty light and moves easily, (good for my wife). Otherwise solid product. Keep in mind, you get what you pay for, so if you're expecting high end designer furniture, this is not it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Pezzula

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this great seat for putting shoes on and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this great seat for putting shoes on and can fit a lot of stuff inside. Knocked off a star do to the bottom having tears not big but will have to repair so they don't get bigger. Looks great and solid comfortable seat.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: This ottoman is really nice. The only improvement I could make would be ...
customer_reviews.text: This ottoman is really nice. The only improvement I could make would be to make the fabric on the top one solid piece instead of having the criss-cross seam, but I can definitely live with it at this fantastic price. it's very sturdy, the top is padded very nicely. Exactly what I wanted. :)
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy, pretty print easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Very light not heavy. Should serve the purpose it was bought for. Love the print. Maybe a little high for the quality but still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jax

customer_reviews.title: Simply lovely
customer_reviews.text: Lovely. Nice storage space and it is a very nice piece. Easy to assemble (just add legs). Perfect for all my couch throws.
customer_reviews.author: Olgie 🌺

customer_reviews.title: Held my weight of 263lbs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the price. Tones of storage space , easy to assemble, and sturdy! I wan 263lbs when I bought this for my vanity table/ white desk (also purchased on amizon for $60 ) . This ottoman is so comfortable and the perfect size. It fits exactly right under my desk. The whole set up cost me $120 , I also added a $15 tapestry (also purchased on Amazon that tied the look together .
customer_reviews.author: Ajay S. Sergill

customer_reviews.title: A perfect fit for my living room
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece. Im using it to store blankets and 2 pillows for guests. It was extremely easy to put together and matches my wierd colored sofa perfectly. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Lilithe

customer_reviews.title: NICE!!! BUT....
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautiful product! The only downside was some of the grease from the little metal pieces got on the fabric... Luck it was only on the bottom
customer_reviews.author: Eli The Frenchie

customer_reviews.title: Lovely little ottoman
customer_reviews.text: The ottoman was easy to put together (just had to attach the legs). It looks lovely in my reading room. However, you do need to know that the top is stitched across from corner to corner. I still like it, but this may be a consideration for other buyers.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Lake

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! So nice looking and perfect for my front entrance room (aka foyer). I'm really happy with this purchase, and that I have another place to stash junk since my house has minimal storage!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ExtremeAmazonAddictTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ottoman for our camper
customer_reviews.text: We just purchased a new travel trailer, and we needed an ottoman for our sofa. The color and design were a nice addition. Plus, extra storage is always a plus. We use it for our sofa throws.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS!!! Great value for the money! Looks awesome in my livingroom!! Well made!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Iorio

customer_reviews.title: As shown-very nice!
customer_reviews.text: The storage is a bonus...I needed a foot stool/table for in front of a small couch and this one is very handsome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and functional so far
customer_reviews.text: I have had this ottoman for about a month. It was very easy to assemble, and has a great deal of storage space. I sit on it every day as I do my hair, and I have found it to be very comfortable. I am very pleased with this product and would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Caprese

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Looks as good as picture. Easy to assemble. Storage holds 2 of my 50x60 throws. I stood on it once, sit on it often, so it's sturdy. The cushion on top is a little soft, it indents but reshapes easily . The fabric is nicely decorated with writing. Good value for the money. Others I looked at were a $100+
customer_reviews.author: J. Medina

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty and easy to put together, however, the top of the bench is backward! So, I had to turn it around to face the wall so it looks right. No one can tell - unless they go to open it for some reason, so it's not a huge deal, but still, it would be nice if they put the piece together correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Lunder

customer_reviews.title: Style and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, pattern easily blends in with any interior, non-assuming, soft comfy seat, love it still!
customer_reviews.author: Irina Latkova

customer_reviews.title: Must buy super cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: Super cute Furniture I ever owned. I just need to add something next to my girl room and it fit perfect LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: manjit

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, just beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, just beautiful. Easy to put together and added just what I needed to the room. I did not realize until I opened the box that the bottom of the bench is lined with nailhead trim. Very classy!
customer_reviews.author: QltrGrl

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, great buy, one of my favorite purchases.
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for a sturdy amd beautiful piece of furniture. We use it in the entryway to store shoes and it fits about 5 pair of mine (heels and booties) and 2 of my husbands. Oh and it has withstood my toddler constantly climbing on and off of it, he loves it too!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good size, not so much storage space, but perfect for what I need. It looks great in my daughter's study room.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This piece looks great in our home. Used for storage of all our hats and gloves. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute decor
customer_reviews.text: Love the pattern, it is strong, looks better in person, it is a charcoal grey, enough storage for 2 to 3 medium size throw blankets.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Paris

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They aren't very big but they store throws or other things you need/want access to but want out of the way. The print is beautiful. I bought two to be put at the end of two twin beds. They are nice to sit on and put your shoes on or off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect storage bench
customer_reviews.text: The storage bench is exactly as described. I love the hinged seat. It stays up and only closes when you push it down gently. The dark gray color coordinates well with my decor. Would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: R. Donna Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Nice but damaged
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice and sturdy, however, it came ripped on the inside, I think it's old stock.
customer_reviews.author: Elvira

product_meta.description: Color:Gray/BlackThe Stephanie Grey Script Linen Ottoman is perfect for adding storage and seating to a bedroom; entry or hallway. The script patterned linen top and sides are accented by the dark black finished legs. Ample interior storage space keeps linens; toys; and m.
feature_bullets: Legs Stand 6.5" tall - Weight Capacity: 350 lbs.
